name: TeamViewer Video Session File
summary: Learn about .TVS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Users may record all sessions in TeamViewer by selecting the option Extras → Options → Advanced → Automatically start Session Recorder when beginning remote control session.
NOTE: You can upload a TVS file to the TVS to MP4 online program and convert the recorded video to an .MP4 file.

description: A TVS file is a video file created by TeamViewer, a program that allows users to remotely control desktop computers. It contains video recorded from a remote session and is used for creating demonstration videos and recording session histories. TVS files may be played back in TeamViewer.
